command.section: ChanServ provides users with the ability to register channels. ChanServ allows you to customize your channel to suit your needs, eliminating the need for a channel bot.

REGISTER - Register a channel IDENTIFY - Identify yourself as the founder of a channel INFO - Get information on a registered channel SET - Change your channel settings LISTOP - List current channel operators CHANOP - Modify the channel operator list AKICK - Modify the channel autokick list
UNBAN MDEOP INVITE TOPICLOCK MLOCK RESTRICT ACCESS OP DEOP WIPEAK MKICK MAOP AOP MSOP SOP MFOUNDER
Type /ChanServ help <command> for more help with each command. For further assistance with services, /join #Help.
